message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I believe it will be highly valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the value of this product is significant. How about we meet in the middle at $18,000?
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $15,000. Is that a price you'd be willing to accept?
